text: Prisoners is a 2013 American thriller drama movie directed by Denis Villeneuve and starring Hugh Jackman, Jake Gyllenhaal, Viola Davis, Maria Bello, Terrence Howard, Melissa Leo, Paul Dano. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 2014. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:2013 drama thriller movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Denis Villeneuve
title: Prisoners (2013 movie)
